audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Advanced End Users

name: Auieo CRM
short_description:
AuieoCRM is a modified version on VTigerCRM. It has all the functionality of the VTiger. It has improved and efficient code base.

The AuieoCRM has the following advantage
1) Savant3 is used as template engine instead of VTiger's Smarty.
2) PDO is used instead of VTiger's ADODB
3) Has three level of users
    a) Super Admin - has all the permission overrides profile assigned to him.
    b) Admin - has all the permission in VTiger's Settings and behave according to profile assigned to him
    c) Regular User - has no permission to VTiger's Settings and will behave according to profile assigned to him
summary: AuieoCRM is a modified version on VTigerCRM
